about_the_game:
Elephant Games proudly presents a new take on a classic tale in Cursed Fables: Before the Clock Strikes!

It’s the night of your beloved stepdaughter Cinderella’s ball! It promises to be an evening to remember for both you and your daughters, especially as Cinderella says she has important news to share. But your excitement soon turns to dismay when you’re accused of treason and imprisoned upon your arrival! And that’s not all. Someone is using magic to freeze everyone in the castle, and you’re the only one left to stop them! Can you save your family and the kingdom from dark magic before the clock strikes? Find out in this enchanting Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won't find in the standard version.

The Collector's Edition includes:
● Find the stolen artwork in the bonus game!
● Unlock the Secret Room! Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games to earn achievements!
● Go on an expedition to find collectibles!
● Enjoy exclusive wallpapers, screensavers, music, and more!
● Never get lost with the strategy guide!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

Elephant Games proudly presents a new take on a classic tale in Cursed Fables: Before the Clock Strikes!

It’s the night of your beloved stepdaughter Cinderella’s ball! It promises to be an evening to remember for both you and your daughters, especially as Cinderella says she has important news to share. But your excitement soon turns to dismay when you’re accused of treason and imprisoned upon your arrival! And that’s not all. Someone is using magic to freeze everyone in the castle, and you’re the only one left to stop them! Can you save your family and the kingdom from dark magic before the clock strikes? Find out in this enchanting Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won't find in the standard version.

The Collector's Edition includes:

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.
